description: Metadata to describe signals captured from a diagnostic

shot_id.description: ID of the shot this signal was produced by.

shape.description: Shape of each dimension of this signal. e.g. [10, 100, 3]

units.description: The units of data contained within this dataset.

signal_type.description: The type of the signal dataset. e.g. 'Raw', 'Analysed'

dimensions.description: The dimension names of the dataset, in order. e.g. ['time', 'radius']

image_subclass.description: The subclass for this image data. e.g. 'IMAGE_INDEXED'

image_format.description: The format the image was original recorded in. e.g. IPX
